name: Vive la Revolution
description:
Made for Godot Wild Jam.

Wildcard: Another's Shoes: Have multiple Characters

Vive la Revolution Simple Endless Runner

Made with Godot, Sprites by 0x72: https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-tileset

Play with (currently) 2 different Characters:

Play as a peasant rising up against the harsh rule of the knights. Click to throw your dagger at the evil knights. Evade the stones on your way with A and D.

Play as Luther and safe the dead from going to hell by touching them with your "hand". Use A and D to avoid the stones.

All rights reserved.

We are not responsible for any damage while installing, using or otherwise using our software.
